parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling system in the Dometic refrigerator can cause food spoilage, ammonia leaks, and strong odors, which can lead to health risks and safety hazards.
symptoms: The refrigerator stops cooling
yellow residue is found on the back of the refrigerator
ammonia leaks with a strong odor.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Manufacturer Recall Notice Ignored or Delayed
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to honor recall notices can lead to continued use of defective products, potentially causing safety hazards and accidents.
symptoms: Consumers are not notified of recalls
manufacturers refuse to repair or replace defective products
dealerships refuse to honor recalls.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Defects in trailers can cause safety hazards, accidents, and inconvenience to users.
symptoms: Trailers are not balanced
doors do not shut properly
water leaks
defective plastic pieces on water heaters.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Design flaws in trailer ramps can cause safety hazards and accidents, making it difficult or impossible to use the ramp safely.
symptoms: The rear wall of the trailer
which converts into a ramp
is extremely heavy and cannot be maneuvered by a single individual.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking and failure of the trailer frame can lead to catastrophic failure, causing loss of control, accidents, and potentially fatalities.
symptoms: Cracks in the trailer frame at various locations
including the left rear axle mounting point
bottom flange of the I-beam
and web of the I-beam frame adjacent to the welds attaching the body to the frame support brackets.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the axle spring hanger can cause the axle to move out of alignment, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially fatalities.
symptoms: Axle spring hanger broke loose from the I-beam frame
with part of the steel beam breaking away.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sharp Metal Edging on Slide-Out Mechanism
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sharp metal edging on the slide-out mechanism can cause severe lacerations and injuries to occupants, particularly children, when their feet or legs come into contact with the exposed metal.
symptoms: The metal edging is hidden from view by the carpet
making it a hidden hazard; the gap between the floor of the 5th wheel and the bottom of the slide-out creates a trap for feet or legs; the metal edging is razor-sharp and can cause deep cuts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the slide-out mechanism creates a hazardous gap between the floor of the 5th wheel and the bottom of the slide, which can lead to injuries and accidents.
symptoms: The gap between the floor of the 5th wheel and the bottom of the slide-out is large enough for feet or legs to become trapped; the metal edging is not properly protected or covered; the design of the slide-out mechanism does not take into account the safety of occupants.
